itemList.name: Ultimate Loaded Nacho Fiesta
itemList.desc: Nacho typically consists of layers of crispy tortilla chips topped with a variety of ingredients including melted cheese, seasoned ground beef, sour cream, guacamole, and fresh salsa.

itemList.name: Penne pasta with tomato sauce
itemList.desc: Penne pasta is a versatile and popular type of pasta that is shaped like tubes with diagonally-cut ends, served with rich tomato sauce and fresh herbs.

itemList.name: Burger & French fries
itemList.desc: Your burger dish is a perfect combination of flavors and textures, served with crispy golden French fries on the side.

itemList.name: Smoked Salmon Sandwich
itemList.desc: This sandwich is a delightful combination of fresh crisp lettuce, juicy tomato, nestled with premium smoked salmon and cream cheese spread.

itemList.name: Avocado toasts with radish
itemList.desc: This sandwich is a delightful combination of fresh creamy avocado slices on toasted artisan bread, topped with crispy radish and microgreens.

itemList.name: Cranberry Club Sandwich
itemList.desc: The club sandwich is a classic favorite, known for its layers of deliciousness all sandwiched between three slices of toasted bread, featuring turkey, bacon, and cranberry sauce.

itemList.name: Pasta salad with balsamic vinegar
itemList.desc: Green vegetable pasta dish that incorporates various fresh vegetables tossed in a light balsamic vinaigrette.

itemList.name: Striped handmade ravioli
itemList.desc: Ravioli is a traditional Italian pasta dish loved for its delicate, pillow-like pockets filled with ricotta cheese and herbs.

itemList.name: Pasta carbonara on a plate
itemList.desc: Carbonara pasta is a classic Italian dish known for its rich and creamy sauce made with eggs, pecorino cheese, pancetta, and black pepper.

itemList.name: Biryani Special

itemList.name: Paneer Tikka Masala
itemList.desc: Grilled cottage cheese cubes in a rich, spiced tomato-cream sauce.

itemList.name: Dal Makhani
itemList.desc: Creamy black lentils slow-cooked with butter and spices.

itemList.name: Chicken Tikka
itemList.desc: Marinated chicken pieces grilled to perfection in tandoor.

itemList.name: Garlic Naan
itemList.desc: Freshly baked bread with garlic and butter.

itemList.name: Butter Roti
itemList.desc: Whole wheat bread brushed with butter.

itemList.name: Gulab Jamun
itemList.desc: Sweet milk dumplings soaked in sugar syrup.

itemList.name: Rasmalai
itemList.desc: Soft cottage cheese patties in sweetened milk.

itemList.name: Kheer
itemList.desc: Traditional rice pudding with nuts and cardamom.

itemList.name: Margherita Supreme
itemList.desc: Classic pizza with fresh mozzarella, tomatoes, and basil.

itemList.name: BBQ Chicken Pizza
itemList.desc: Smoky BBQ sauce, grilled chicken, red onions, and fresh cilantro.

itemList.name: Mediterranean Delight
itemList.desc: Olives, feta, sun-dried tomatoes, and spinach.

itemList.name: Meat Lovers
itemList.desc: Pepperoni, sausage, bacon, and ground beef.

itemList.desc: Bell peppers, mushrooms, onions, olives, and corn.

itemList.desc: Freshly baked breadsticks with garlic butter.

itemList.desc: Crispy wings with choice of sauce.
